summary: The TRICARE Equality Act (H.R. 2632) aims to improve the administration of the TRICARE program in Puerto Rico. It mandates the Secretary of Defense to designate TRICARE Prime geographical areas in Puerto Rico similarly to how they are designated in the states. The bill also expands travel benefits for individuals in Puerto Rico, facilitates health information exchange through the Joint Health Information Exchange, and requires a report from the Secretary of Defense on implementation progress within 180 days.
